item.title: Google (and others) stopped indexing sites automatically
item.description: Before here was my rambling about how google and other search engines are not indexing this site. But I wrote that I did my initial research. But now I did a deep dive into all SEO stuff and found that the theme that I use had a metatag <meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow"> and required special configuration for it to change to ‘index, follow’. So I will change it today and see give it more time for search engines to catch up.

item.title: Swing VPN app is a DDOS botnet
item.description: tldr: Swing VPN is using its user base to DDOS sites using its users as a an attack botnet. Introduction It all started with a friend of mine complaining that his phone was doing a request to a specific app every few seconds. Initial assumption was that the phone was infected with a virus but a 2 minute investigation showed that all requests went from ‘Swing VPN’ app which were legitimately installed on the phone as VPN service.
